sys_script_include.name: AvailableBooksService

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_2396d4aa93260610ef267c5efaba1078
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_1383151_bkquest.AvailableBooksService</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>AvailableBooksService</name><script><![CDATA[var AvailableBooksService = Class.create();

AvailableBooksService.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    getAvailableBooks: function() {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_1383151_bkquest_book_copy');
        gr.addQuery('status', 'available');
        gr.query();

        var books = [];
        while (gr.next()) {
            var book = {
                title: gr.getValue('title'),
                author: gr.getValue('author'),
                publisher: gr.getValue('publisher'),
                year: gr.getValue('year')
            };
            books.push(book);
        }

        return books;
    },

    type: 'AvailableBooksService'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>harini.srija</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-05 07:10:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>2396d4aa93260610ef267c5efaba1078</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AvailableBooksService</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BookQuest" source="x_1383151_bkquest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="BookQuest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2396d4aa93260610ef267c5efaba1078</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>harini.srija</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-18 10:21:15</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
